about-me.title: About me
about-me.description: Hi, I'm a German-speaking Junior Frontend Developer based near Munich. Inspired by the boundless potential of the tech industry, I am dedicated to designing visually appealing and highly intuitive websites and applications.
about-me.section-1: I am adaptable to various working environments and can collaborate efficiently both on-site in Munich and remotely.
about-me.section-2: I love to learn new skills and always seeking new challenges to continually enhance my knowledge and expertise.
about-me.section-3: In my field, programming goes beyond writing code; it's a creative approach to solving problems. I take pride in transforming complex technical challenges into clear, user-centric solutions. This way, I support you in achieving your objectives and bringing your ideas to life.

my-skills.title: My skills
my-skills.section-1: I have developed expertise in creating projects using a variety of frontend technologies and methodologies.
my-skills.section-4: Don't hesitate to get in touch. I'm eager to build on my existing knowledge.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.section: Check out some of my work here - interact with the projects to experience my skills firsthand.
portfolio.project-1: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
portfolio.project-2: A simple Jump N Run Game based on object oriented Programming. Help Pepe to collect coins and fight against chickens.
portfolio.project-3: PokeAPI-powered Pokemon-Database to get all the information you need about your favorite little monsters!

contact.title: Contact
contact.section-2: Reach out using this form. I’m eager to hear your ideas and contribute to your projects with my expertise.

checkbox.section-3: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
